Raghvind Yadav is a Flutter developer based in New Delhi, India. He has around 2 years of experience in the field and has worked on several projects, including a citizenly search app, micromentor app, and mishi: music wellness app. He holds a B.Tech degree in Computer Science Engineering from IK Gujral Punjab University with an impressive CGPA of 83.7.
